original_title: Touching Water for the First Time
overview: We payed the Creatures of Yes five hundred dollars to dip their hands in water. You won't believe their reactions! Have you ever touched water before? And if so, did you like it? Creatures of Yes is a weekly puppet show about positivity and inclusivity made by Jacob Graham and Co in Brooklyn NY. We release new videos every Friday. The show is also a time travel experiment. We only use cameras and other technologies from the 1970s and earlier.
title: Touching Water for the First Time
